verses.verse: Now <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H87>Abram,<s%> "Get <S%H3212>out<s%> of your <S%H776>country,<s%> and from your <S%H4138>relatives,<s%> and from your <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H1004>house,<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> that I will show <S%H7200>you.<s%>

I will make of <S%H6213>you<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1471>nation.<s%> I will <S%H1288>bless<s%> you and <S%H1431>make<s%> your <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H1431>great.<s%> You will be a <S%H1293>blessing.<s%>

I will <S%H1288>bless<s%> those who <S%H1288>bless<s%> <S%H779>you,<s%> and I will curse him who <S%H779>curses<s%> <S%H4940>you.<s%> All of the families of the <S%H127>earth<s%> will be blessed in <S%H1288>you.<s%>"

So <S%H87>Abram<s%> <S%H3212>went,<s%> as <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> had <S%H1696>spoken<s%> to <S%H3876>him.<s%> Lot <S%H3212>went<s%> with <S%H87>him.<s%> Abram was <S%H7657>seventy<s%>- <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when he <S%H3318>departed<s%> out of <S%H2771>Haran.<s%>

<S%H87>Abram<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H8297>Sarai<s%> his <S%H802>wife,<s%> <S%H3876>Lot<s%> his <S%H251>brother<s%>'s <S%H1121>son,<s%> all their <S%H7399>substance<s%> that they had <S%H7408>gathered,<s%> and the <S%H5315>souls<s%> whom they had <S%H6213>gotten<s%> in <S%H2771>Haran,<s%> and they <S%H3318>went<s%> to <S%H3212>go<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan.<s%> Into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%> they <S%H935>came.<s%>

<S%H87>Abram<s%> passed <S%H5674>through<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> to the <S%H4725>place<s%> of <S%H7927>Shechem,<s%> to the <S%H436>oak<s%> of <S%H4176>Moreh.<s%> The <S%H3669>Canaanite<s%> was <S%H227>then<s%> in the <S%H776>land.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> to <S%H87>Abram<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "I will <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> to your <S%H2233>seed.<s%>" He <S%H1129>built<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> there to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> who appeared to <S%H7200>him.<s%>

He <S%H6275>left<s%> from there to the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> on the <S%H6924>east<s%> of <S%H1008>Bethel,<s%> and <S%H5186>pitched<s%> his <S%H168>tent,<s%> having <S%H1008>Bethel<s%> on the <S%H3220>west,<s%> and <S%H5857>Ai<s%> on the <S%H6924>east.<s%> There he <S%H1129>built<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> on the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
<S%H87>Abram<s%> <S%H5265>traveled,<s%> going <S%H1980>on<s%> <S%H5265>still<s%> toward the <S%H5045>South.<s%>

There was a <S%H7458>famine<s%> in the <S%H776>land.<s%> <S%H87>Abram<s%> went <S%H3381>down<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> to <S%H1481>live<s%> as a foreigner <S%H7458>there,<s%> for the famine was <S%H3515>severe<s%> in the <S%H776>land.<s%>

It <S%H834>happened,<s%> when he had come <S%H7126>near<s%> to <S%H935>enter<s%> <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> that he <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8297>Sarai<s%> his <S%H802>wife,<s%> <S%H2009>"See<s%> <S%H4994>now,<s%> I <S%H3045>know<s%> that you are a <S%H3303>beautiful<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%> to look <S%H4758>at.<s%>

It will <S%H4713>happen,<s%> when the Egyptians will <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H559>you,<s%> that they will say, <S%H802><s%> 'This is his wife.' They will <S%H2026>kill<s%> <S%H2421>me,<s%> but they will save you alive.

Please <S%H559>say<s%> that <S%H4994>you<s%> are my <S%H269>sister,<s%> <S%H4616>that<s%> it may be <S%H3190>well<s%> with me for your <S%H5315>sake,<s%> and that my soul may <S%H2421>live<s%> because of <S%H1558>you.<s%>"

It happened that when <S%H87>Abram<s%> had <S%H935>come<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> the <S%H4713>Egyptians<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that the <S%H802>woman<s%> was <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3303>beautiful.<s%>

The <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H1984>her,<s%> and praised her <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh;<s%> and the <S%H802>woman<s%> was <S%H3947>taken<s%> into <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>'s <S%H1004>house.<s%>

He <S%H3190>dealt<s%> <S%H3190>well<s%> with <S%H87>Abram<s%> for her <S%H6629>sake.<s%> He had sheep, <S%H1241>cattle,<s%> male <S%H2543>donkeys,<s%> male <S%H5650>servants,<s%> female <S%H8198>servants,<s%> female <S%H860>donkeys,<s%> and <S%H1581>camels.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5060>plagued<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> and his <S%H1004>house<s%> with <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5061>plagues<s%> because <S%H1697>of<s%> <S%H8297>Sarai,<s%> <S%H87>Abram<s%>'s <S%H802>wife.<s%>

<S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H87>Abram<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "What is this that you have <S%H6213>done<s%> to <S%H5046>me?<s%> Why didn't you tell me that she was your <S%H802>wife?<s%>

Why did <S%H559>you<s%> <S%H269>say,<s%> 'She is my sister,' so that I <S%H3947>took<s%> her to be my <S%H802>wife?<s%> Now <S%H802>therefore,<s%> see your wife, <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H3212>her,<s%> and go your way."
<S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> concerning <S%H7971>him,<s%> and they brought him on the way with his wife and all that he <S%H802>had.<s%>
